Sentencas: A thin and fully dense BaCe0.6Zr0.2Y0.2O3-delta(BCZY) electrolyte for the use of anode-supported protonic fuel cells has been successfully prepared by spin coating using NiO sintering aid.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: The effects of NiO addition on the electrolyte microstructures and fuel cell performances are also investigated.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: An appropriate NiO addition has a significant positive contribution to the densification and grain growth of thin BCZY electrolytes.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: However, too much NiO addition gives rise to NiO aggregation in BCZY electrolyte and deteriorates the cell performance.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: The enhanced sintering mechanism can be mainly attributed to the oxygen vacancies generated from the NiO decomposition and bulk diffusion of Ni into BCZY perovskites.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: The fuel cell with a BCZY-3%NiO electrolyte exhibits the highest maximum power density of similar to 106.6 mW/cm(2) at 800 degrees C among all fuel cells in this study.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance characteristics of thin BCZY electrolyte fuel cells are further discussed under open circuit conditions.
Titulo: Fabrication of anode-supported thin BCZY electrolyte protonic fuel cells using NiO sintering aid
